title: Noam Chomsky EXPLAINS Israel's Judicial Crisis
description:
--
* To Support More Interviews With Great People, Be Sure To Subscribe, Like, Comment and Share*
--

Noam Chomsky shares the deeper reasons behind Israel's Judicial Crisis and explains its serious nature.

--

From Wikipedia: Noam Chomsky is an American public intellectual: a linguist, philosopher, cognitive scientist, historian, social critic, and political activist. Sometimes called "the father of modern linguistics", Chomsky is also a major figure in analytic philosophy and one of the founders of the field of cognitive science. He is a Laureate Professor of Linguistics at the University of Arizona and an Institute Professor Emeritus at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), and is the author of more than 150 books on topics such as linguistics, war, and politics.
